## StandardTechniqueParams.emissive property

Emissive (light) color of the material, essentially a solid color unaffected by other lighting. Default is black. See https://threejs.org/docs/\#api/en/materials/MeshStandardMaterial.emissive.  color-hex

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
emissive?: DynamicProperty<StyleColor>;
```
